![Black-myth-wukong-Celestial-Birthstone-Fragment.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/46/Black-myth-wukong-Celestial-Birthstone-Fragment.jpg)| Celestial Birthstone Fragment| Legendary | Ignores the enemy's Four Bane resistances | Found in Mount Huaguo upon defeating Lang-Baw-Baw| Celestial Birthstone Fragment"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*, likely a piece of equipment or artifact. Based on the surrounding text, it appears to be part of a guide detailing collectible items, their rarity, effects, and locations. This specific item is not explicitly named in the provided context but is visually consistent with the other items described, which offer unique combat or resistance enhancements and are obtained by defeating specific enemies in the game.
